pr_title: treat all Command arguments as strings when substituting

timeline.message: treat all Command arguments as strings when substituting

timeline.bodyText:
Command.fill_args() is conditionally called, so I'd suggest to convert to string once for all at init time of self.cmd, by doing this assignment in Command.__init__():
        self.cmd = map(str, cmd)

If at all, map() will slightly improve performance over calling str() in a loop.
timeline.author: eric-saintetienne
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -333,6 +333,7 @@ def fill_arg(self, args_append=None, args_subst=None):
         newcmd = []
         subst_done = -1
         for i, cmdarg in enumerate(self.cmd):
+            cmdarg = str(cmdarg)

replies.bodyText: will be done in #3225 , thanks for the neat idea !
replies.author: vladak
